{"id":718120845,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1654781302,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"335 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/718120845/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"10.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int mem[1010][1010],n,m;\n    string s,t;\n    int dp(int l,int r){\n        if(l>=n||r>=m){\n            int cost=(n-l)+(m-r);\n            return cost;\n        }\n        if(mem[l][r]!=-1){\n            return mem[l][r];\n        }\n        int ans=INT_MAX;\n        if(s[l]==t[r]){\n            ans=dp(l+1,r+1);\n        }\n        else{\n            ans=min(ans,dp(l+1,r)+1);\n            ans=min(ans,dp(l,r+1)+1);\n        }\n       return mem[l][r]=ans;\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        s=word1;\n        t=word2;\n        n=s.size();\n        m=t.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=m;j++){\n                mem[i][j]=-1;\n            }\n        }\n        int ans=dp(0,0);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
